Info.Description: Reverses all colors in the image based on individual color channel settings, resulting in a photo-negative effect. Adjusting the sliders for the Red, Green, Blue, and Alpha channels allows for artistic effects and selective enhancement of specific image details.

Properties.Name: Red Channel
Properties.Summary: Inverts the red color channel. Moving the slider to the right increases the inversion effect for red hues, while moving it to the left decreases it.

Properties.Name: Green Channel
Properties.Summary: Inverts the green color channel. Sliding to the right intensifies the inversion effect for green hues, while sliding to the left reduces it.

Properties.Name: Blue Channel
Properties.Summary: Inverts the blue color channel. Moving the slider to the right amplifies the inversion effect for blue hues, while moving it to the left decreases it.

Properties.Name: Alpha Channel
Properties.Summary: Inverts the alpha (transparency) channel. Increasing the slider value will make opaque areas more transparent and vice versa.
